description:
This course explores an aspect of 18th-century literature intensively; specific course topics will vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS 18TH-C BRITISH LIT: Talking Treason: 18th-Century Lit and the Origins of the 1st Amendment
